item.title: Robert Wilson, Experimental Playwright and Director, Dies at 83
item.description: Robert Wilson, an experimental theater stage director, playwright, founder and artistic director of The Watermill Center, died on July 31. He was 83. Wilson’s death was confirmed on his personal websi
